item.title: Link Type and Join Types in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to Link Types (Active, Delayed, Passive) and Join Types (InnerJoin, OuterJoin, ExistJoin, NotExistJoin) in Dynamics AX 2012. Learn data source relationships and SQL query patterns.
